data.name: Synergy
data.detailed_description:
NEWSLETTER


Wishlist more games from Goblinz!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1561040/Diluvian_Winds/


About the Game

Introduction



Humans live on a hostile planet. To ensure their survival, they must learn to survive in extreme weather conditions and in an environment that is not conducive to their development.
Careful and pragmatic management of resources has become essential to the survival of human race, as has the morale of the population.

Main Features



  • Manage weather, seasons, extreme conditions and natural disasters.
  • Build a city with the happiness of its inhabitants as its main goal.
  • Explore and analyze their world in order to adapt the evolution of their city.

Additional Features



  • Respect the physical and mental needs of the inhabitants.
  • Live in harmony with fauna and flora.
  • Make short or long-term choices.
  • Play different scenarios to enjoy various experiences.
  • Sandbox mode: experiment with different combinations by yourself.

data.short_description: Humans live on a hostile planet. In this survival city-building game, develop your city, face natural disasters, make the right choices. Explore this environment-changing world while keeping your people happy despite extreme weather conditions.
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 and/or OpenGL 3.3 compatible video card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 and/or OpenGL 3.3 compatible video card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
